quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
author: Jean de La Bruyère

quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
author: Unknown

quote: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of commitment.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: It's not always that we need to do more but rather that we need to focus on less.
author: Nathan W. Morris

quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
author: Peter T. McIntyre

quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Let go of what you can't control. Serenity will follow.
author: Unknown

quote: Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you’ve been together. Love is about how much you love each other every day.
author: Unknown

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

quote: A great relationship is about two things: First, appreciating the similarities, and second, respecting the differences.
author: Unknown

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Faith is seeing light with your heart when all your eyes see is darkness.
author: Barbara Johnson

quote: When you leave everything in God’s hands, you see God’s hand in everything.
author: Unknown

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
author: Dan Millman

quote: It’s not stress that kills us, it is our reaction to it.
author: Hans Selye
